title: Grand Canyon National Park
description: In May 2016, my wife and I took a post-graduation roadtrip to the Grand Canyon.

photos.description: The canyon. A lot of it looks like this, but I liked the outcropping in the foreground.
photos.alt: A very large canyon wall in the far background with a small rocky formation in the foreground.

photos.description: More canyon. It's very deep and long and wide.
photos.alt: A wide view of the canyon leading off into the distance.

photos.description: Some flying insect that I spent quite a while trying to get in focus because I refuse to use auto-focus for no real reason other than it's a fun game.
photos.alt: A small flying insect in focus in the center and the rest of the background very blurred.
The canyon wall in the background with a rocky outcropping in the foreground.

photos.description: A raven flying over the canyon. If you look at my other photos, you'll see a trend of birds in flight.
photos.alt: A flying raven in the foreground with the canyon filling the background.

photos.description: A raven looking much more majestic sitting in a tree than they do hopping around on the ground eating cheetos that people dropped.
photos.alt: A raven sitting in a tree looking into the distance with sky behind it.

photos.description: One more canyon shot, but this time with the river.
photos.alt: The canyon extending into the distance with a river running along the bottom.
